cbinstall.name: CB Activity
cbinstall.author: Krileon
cbinstall.copyright: (C) 2004-2017 www.joomlapolis.com / Lightning MultiCom SA - and its licensors, all rights reserved
cbinstall.description: Displays various user activity on profile.

param.name: activity_asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets for this activity. Asset determines activity location (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for profile field activity based off the displayed user (e.g. profile.[user_id].field.[field_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, profile.[viewer_id].field.[field_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], and [field_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

param.name: notifications_asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets for notifications. Asset determines notifications location (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for all notifications based off the displayed user (e.g. profile.[user_id].field.[field_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, profile.[viewer_id].field.[field_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], and [field_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

param.name: comments_asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets for comments. Asset determines comments location (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for profile field comments based off the displayed user (e.g. profile.[user_id].field.[field_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, profile.[viewer_id].field.[field_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], and [field_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

param.name: following_asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets to follow. Asset determines what stream will be followed (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for profile asset based off the displayed user (e.g. profile.[user_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, profile.[viewer_id].field.[field_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], and [field_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

param.name: likes_asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets to like. Asset determines what stream will be liked (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for profile asset based off the displayed user (e.g. profile.[user_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars, profile.[viewer_id].field.[field_id]) in addition to custom [displayed_id], [viewer_id], and [field_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

param.name: activity_asset
param.label: Asset
param.description: Optionally input the comma separated assets for this activity. Asset determines activity location (e.g. global.cars, profile.[user_id], profile.%). Use a wildcard of % to match anything starting at and after the wildcard. Leave blank for profile activity based off the displayed user (e.g. profile.[user_id]). Additionally substitutions are supported (e.g. profile.[user_id].cars) in addition to custom [displayed_id] and [viewer_id]. The following custom assets can also be used: global, profile, following, followingonly, likes, likesonly, connections, connectionsonly, self, self.connections, self.connectionsonly, self.following, self.followingonly, self.likes, self.likesonly, user, user.connections, user.connectionsonly, user.following, user.followingonly, user.likes, user.likesonly, displayed, displayed.connections, displayed.connectionsonly, displayed.following, displayed.followingonly, displayed.likes, and displayed.likesonly.

param.name: general_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Select template to be used for all of CB Activity. If template is incomplete then missing files will be used from the default template. Template files can be located at the following location: components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbactivity/templates/.

param.name: general_class
param.label: Class
param.description: Optionally add a class suffix to surrounding DIV encasing all of CB Activity.

param.name: general_delete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of activity when a user is deleted.

param.name: general_menu
param.label: Admin Menu
param.description: Enable or disable usage of backend administrator menu.

param.name: general_notifications
param.label: Notifications
param.description: Enable or disable display of notifications icon on profiles. This will be displayed on the users menu bar above their profile.

param.name: likes_include
param.label: Include
param.description: Optionally specify what types to include for selection. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: likes_exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.description: Optionally exclude types from being selected. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: following_connected
param.label: Connected
param.description: Enable or disable connected check. This checks if the viewing user is connected to the asset (e.g. in cases of profile.USER_ID) or stream owner. This is in addition to registered user access check. If disabled only registered user access check will be used to determine following permission. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: reporting
param.label: Reporting
param.description: Enable or disable reporting of activity or comments to moderators. Reported activity or comments will be marked as controversial and automatically hidden from the reporter.

param.name: reporting_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable notifying moderators of reported activity or comments.

param.name: reporting_limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Input the number of reports before a reported activity or comment becomes automatically unpublished. Set to 0 for no automatic unpublish.

param.name: cleanup_url
param.label: URL
param.description: Your site unique URL that can be used in CRON or directly accessed to cleanup old activity from the database.

param.name: cleanup_activity
param.label: Activity
param.description: Select how long to keep activity. Note this will delete all activity outside of the duration and includes notifications.

param.name: cleanup_comments
param.label: Comments
param.description: Select how long to keep comments. Note this will delete all comments outside of the duration.
